job_description:
Position Overview

ShyftLabs is looking for a Senior Developer that can help us develop and grow various platforms and systems. This role will work closely with the Product team to to plan new features, lead a team of engineers to develop and test them, and collaborate acrossmultiple teams to deploy and monitor releases.

ShyftLabs is a growing data product company that was founded in early 2020, and works primarily with Fortune 500 companies. We deliver digital solutions built to help accelerate the growth of businesses in various industries, by focusing on creating value through innovation.

Job Responsibilities

Lead the development of service-based systems (both front-end and back-end) whileactively contributing to development.

Collaborate with the product team to understand requirements, document complexity,recommend solutions, and communicate risks/roadblocks

Steer development across teams for product services in Python, React, and JavaScript that support business requirements

Develop secure, scalable, and high-quality solutions

Create technical documentation including arch diagrams, data flow diagrams, bestpractices and guidelines, schema documents, API contracts, etc.

Work with architects to design systems and develop frameworks for new features

Write and review Unit Tests

Review and approve Code Merges, ensuring proper development standards and bestpractices are followed

Quickly troubleshoot problems and propose options for solutions

Oversee development and launch of features to spur product growth

Basic Qualifications

8+ years of experience developing software code both front-end and back-end and creating scalable technology platforms

Bachelors (BS) in Computer Science or related field

Strong expertise in Python programming.

Expert in coding with a variety of languages and tools including Python, React, Javascript,Docker, GIT, Rest APIs, PostGres, and SQL

Experience working with AWS tools and products including S3, CloudFront, EC2, RDS,Batch, and Lambda.

Ability to handle large complex IT projects

Proficient in merging business process and technical concepts together to build creativesolutions

Strong communication, with the ability to explain complex concepts verbally and in writtenform

Capacity to adapt quickly when requirements or priorities change

Experience working in Kanban and Agile, with a firm understanding of SoftwareDevelopment lifecycle methodologies

Positive attitude and ability to build strong relationships across teams

We are proud to offer a competitive salary alongside a strong healthcare insurance and benefits package. The role is able to be fully remote within Canada. We pride ourselves on the growth of our employees, offering extensive learning and development resources.

ShyftLabs is an equal-opportunity employer committed to creating a safe, diverse and inclusive environment. We encourage qualified applicants of all backgrounds including ethnicity, religion, disability status, gender identity, sexual orientation, family status, age, nationality, and education levels to apply. If you are contacted for an interview and require accommodation during the interviewing process, please let us know.
